name: Maple Butternut Squash Purée
description: Vegetable purées pair perfectly with roasted meats, grain salads, and roasted vegetables; or, serve them as a side dish with your favourite dinner!
preparation: Place squash in Multipurpose Steamer. Cover and microwave on high for 10 min.
Using the Ground Meat Separator, coarsely mash squash with seasoning, milk, maple syrup, and butter. Using an immersion blender, blend mashed squash mixture until smooth.
tips: Don’t have an immersion blender? Use a food processor or blender instead; but, be aware that when hot foods are blended, the steam needs somewhere to escape. Be very careful! Start blending slowly and with a small amount.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 2 cups leafy greens with 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.
